mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_POINT, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY, SOCIAL_LOGIN_TYPE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND SOCIAL_LOGIN_TYPE = 'D'
